thread.title: Maid charged with killing baby, placing body in bag
thread.title_full: Maid charged with killing baby, placing body in bag

title: Maid charged with killing baby, placing body in bag
text: Alamy Stock Photo The woman delivered the child in her room and then strangled him. The Abu Dhabi criminal court sentenced a woman for life term for killing her new born and placing the body in a bag. The maid also received a one year jail term for adultery to be followed by deportation. Her UAE national sponsor discovered the dead body and the police investigation showed that the baby was born out of wedlock. The maid confessed that she had an illegal relation with an Asian. When she told him that she was pregnant he disappeared. After the woman delivered the child in her room she strangled him, put him in a bag and went about her routine work. Amira Agarib
